## HTMLImageElement.LongDesc property

URI [[IETF RFC 2396](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2396.txt)] designating a long description of this image or frame. See the longdesc attribute definition in HTML 4.01.

```csharp
public string LongDesc { get; set; }
```
